price: Au tutakuonyesha tulio waahidi. Nasi bila ya shaka tuna uweza juu yao.
arabic: أَوۡ نُرِيَنَّكَ ٱلَّذِي وَعَدۡنَٰهُمۡ فَإِنَّا عَلَيۡهِم مُّقۡتَدِرُونَ
footnotes: Au unataka tukuonyeshe adhabu tuliyo waahidi kabla ya kufa kwako, tutakuonyesha, kwani Sisi tunawaweza hao kwa uweza wetu na nguvu zetu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: aw nuriyannaka alladhī waʿadnāhum fa-innā ʿalayhim muq'tadirūna
